mapper.select: select * from board where title like '%'||#{searchContent}||'%' order by bid desc
mapper.insert: insert into board (bid,title,theme,content,fileName) values((select nvl(max(id),0)+1 from board),#{title},#{theme},#{content},#{fileName})
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where bid=#{bid}
